### Bio.
I'm a software engineer located in [Windsor](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Windsor,_Ontario), [Ontario](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ontario), [Canada](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canada).

I have a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science from the University of Windsor, and a Computer Networks Technologist Diploma from St. Clair College of Arts & Science.

### Expertise
I learn about new frameworks and I pick up on development techniques pretty quickly, so I'm not afraid of going out of my comfort zone. 

Right now, I spend most of my time writing web applications using a mix of [Ruby](http://www.ruby-lang.org/en/) and [CoffeeScript](http://coffeescript.org/). A ruby-powered server application (usually running [Ruby on Rails](http://rubyonrails.org/)) serves an API to a rich Javascript client application.

The Javascript application is usually built using a framework such as [Backbone.js](http://backbonejs.org/) or [Batman.js](http://batmanjs.org/) to build the User Interface, persist data to the API, etc...

### Contact Info
Feel free to use my Github profile to contact me: @loginx
